attributes.additional_details:
As recognition for being part of the world's greatest rock band, who have made a pre-eminent contribution to music on a global scale that the following surviving members be Knighted.

James (Jimmy) Page
Robert Plant
John Paul Jones

With record sales of around 300 million, numerous awards and longevity, Wikipedia states " widely considered one of the most successful, innovative and influential rock groups in history".

They compare as, if not more favourably than other Knights of the realm such as James Galway, John Dankworth and Elton John.

Their contribution to music is both outstanding and part of history and this should be recognised for the unique achievements of these individuals.
